summary: Two cops are investigating a drug ring that may be led by an American man who saved them when they were kids. But when he kidnaps one's wife, they must fight through an army of ninjas to save her.
cast: Alexander Rei Lo|George Nicholas|Eugene Thomas|Alex Yip|Rosaline Li|Robinson Yang|Mark Yu|Mimmo Gasbarri|Tae-jeong Kim
title: USA Ninja
